title: Supabase Todo App
description:
Build a complete todo app with Supabase backend:

1. Set up Supabase project and Flutter integration
2. Create 'todos' table with RLS policies
3. Implement authentication (sign up, sign in, sign out)
4. Implement CRUD operations for todos
5. Add real-time sync so changes appear instantly
instructions:
Build a complete todo app with Supabase:

1. Create Supabase project at supabase.com
2. Add supabase_flutter package
3. Initialize in main.dart
4. Create auth service with sign up/in/out
5. Create todos table with user_id foreign key
6. Enable RLS with user-specific policies
7. Implement TodoService with CRUD
8. Subscribe to real-time changes

hints.text: Remember to enable RLS on your todos table in Supabase dashboard
Use .eq() for WHERE clauses, .order() for sorting

commonMistakes.correction: Enable RLS and add policies in Supabase dashboard
